profile.personalInfoDesc: Cusboonaysii magacaaga, faahfaahinta xiriirka, iyo sawirka profile-ka
profile.languageDesc: Dooro luuqadda aad rabto in app-ku ku shaqeeyo
profile.currencyDesc: Dooro lacagta aad rabto in qiimaha iyo bixinta lagu muujiyo
profile.themeDarkDesc: Isticmaal mawduuca madow si aad u aragto si fiican iftiin yar
profile.themeLightDesc: Isticmaal mawduuca cad si aad u aragto si fiican iftiin badan
profile.currencyChangeError: Waa lagu guuldareystay in la beddelo lacagta. Fadlan isku day mar kale.

currencyInfo.title: Xogta Lacagta
currencyInfo.description: Lacagta aad dooratay ayaa lagu isticmaali doonaa app-ka oo dhan si loo muujiyo qiimaha iyo bixinta. Had iyo jeer waad beddeli kartaa.

profile.hostModeDesc: U beddel inta u dhaxaysa habka martigeliyaha iyo socotada
profile.helpCenterDesc: Hel caawimaad iyo jawaabo su'aalaha caadiga ah
profile.resetAppDesc: Hagaaji dhibaatooyinka adigoo tirtiraya xogta kaydsan

languageInfo.title: Xogta Luuqadda
languageInfo.description: Dooro luuqadda aad rabto in app-ku ku shaqeeyo. Tani waxay beddeli doontaa dhammaan qoraalka iyo fariimaha.

themeInfo.title: Xogta Mawduuca
themeInfo.description: Dooro sida app-ku u ekaan doono. Nidaamku wuxuu raaci doonaa dejinta qalabkaaga.

helpCenterInfo.title: Xarunta Caawinta
helpCenterInfo.description: Hel jawaabo su'aalaha caadiga ah iyo taageero ku saabsan isticmaalka app-ka.

feedbackInfo.title: Bixi Fikrad
feedbackInfo.description: Waxaan jeclaan lahayn inaan kaa maqalno! La wadaag fikirkaaga, talooyinkaaga, ama soo sheeg dhibaatooyinka aad la kulantay.

termsInfo.title: Shuruudaha Adeegga
termsInfo.description: Akhri shuruudaha iyo xaaladaha xukuma isticmaalka app-ka.

upload.profileImageSuccess: Sawirka profile-ka si guul leh ayaa loo soo geliyay
upload.profileImageError: Waa lagu guuldareystay in la soo geliyo sawirka profile-ka
upload.propertyImageSuccess: Sawirrada hantida si guul leh ayaa loo soo geliyay
upload.propertyImageError: Waa lagu guuldareystay in la soo geliyo sawirrada hantida
upload.unitImageSuccess: Sawirrada unugga si guul leh ayaa loo soo geliyay
upload.unitImageError: Waa lagu guuldareystay in la soo geliyo sawirrada unugga
upload.imageTooLarge: Cabbirka sawirku waa inuu ka yar yahay {{maxSize}}MB
upload.unsupportedFormat: Qaabka sawirka lama taageero. Fadlan isticmaal JPEG, PNG, ama WebP
upload.networkError: Khalad shabakad. Fadlan hubi xiriirkaaga oo isku day mar kale
